message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $1500000. It's a real steal, considering its value to me. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer, but $1200000 is a little too low for me right now. I'm willing to come down to $1350000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's work together to make this happen!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1275000. Can you consider that?

Bob, I understand your position, but $1275000 is still a little too low. I'm willing to compromise a bit more and come down to $1300000. This price reflects the product's value and allows us to reach an agreement. Let's make this happen!
I'm willing to meet you at $1300000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you think about it?
